Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the Governor and the State Legislature to amend the Vehicle and Traffic law to create enhanced penalties for illegally parking in specially designated school zones.

A Local Law in relation to the disapproval of a determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by Cadman Express Car & Limousine Service Inc., also known as Cadman Express Car and Limo, Inc., also known as Cadman Express Car & Limo Svc Inc. for the renewal of a license to operate a base station in the borough of Brooklyn.
